teaser: If you were waiting for Tim Cook to debut a revolutionary smart watch or television, yesterday wasn't your day.
title: Apple unveils new iPads, but no smart watch yet
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, October 23, 2013
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

Apple has released a bunch of new products this week. But most are pretty familiar. If you were waiting on an Apple television, smart watch, or something even more fantastical, better keep waiting. Marketplace Tech reporter Queena Kim was watching the tech giant's big unveiling event yesterday.

"}]
description: If you were waiting for Tim Cook to debut a revolutionary smart watch or television, yesterday wasn't your day.
contentencoded: Apple has released a bunch of new products this week. But most are pretty familiar. If you were waiting on an Apple television, smart watch, or something even more fantastical, better keep waiting. Marketplace Tech reporter Queena Kim was watching the tech giant's big unveiling event yesterday.
